Vet app is online vet application. in Vet app your pet can be checkup via online or make an appointment for checkup. in vet app you also can buy medicine or some stuff that related to pets such as grooming, buy a pet food, etc. here is the link if you want to see the prorotype or just click here if you want to see the figma https://www.figma.com/file/ECVoxeTEfzRx0BBF9cfK6h/Petvet-Apps?type=design&node-id=0%3A1&mode=design&t=L69FMI6yciU6veG1-1

A concert ticket reservation system using Java has features such as login, registration, ticket category selection, verification, payment, and generating a transaction receipt with detailed seat information, pricing, and user details. The Railway Ticket Reservation System program offers users the ability to choose dates, stations, and seat configurations. Here is the github link https://github.com/MatahariP/FP_RailwayTicketReservation

I capably mentored over 25 Information System students, ascertaining their competency in implementing object-oriented programming (OOP) using the Java programming language. We learned about what is OOP, variable and data type. Also we disscus about Class, Pbject and Method and how we implements that thing in real porject. Taking Course in Coursera called Meta Back-End Developer. One of the course is introduction to Back-End Development. In this course I learn about how internet works, how server works, how website works, what is HTML, CSS, and javascript. learn how to build basic website design, etc

I took this course for my Artificial Intelligence class at my college. In this course, we delved into the fundamentals of data science, including the application of these concepts in tangible projects. One of the projects I chose involved classifying mobile phone prices based on technical attributes using the Random Forest algorithm. The dataset I utilized was sourced from Kaggle, titled 'Mobile Price Classification.'

SENAMIKA UPNVJ is a national seminar in the field of computer science organized by UPN Veteran Jakarta, aimed at scientific discussions and journal publications among researchers, practitioners, and students.
